Data science lab research

The Data Science Lab at Dong-A University aims to incorporate a knowledge graph into recommender systems. Our goal is to discover potential paths between users and items by exploring dynamic interlinks within an evolving knowledge graph. We apply various recommendation, analytics, and reasoning techniques to real-time processing of data streams and (quasi-)static datasets in areas such as air quality monitoring, smart energy monitoring, location intelligence, retail tech, massive online open courses, and more.

Featured project
Carbon-friendly

About The process involves measuring the carbon emissions generated from deep learning training. If a server's training process produces high carbon emissions, we transfer the workload to servers with lower carbon emissions. Ultimately, this method aims to achieve a carbon net-zero state.
